summary.para: Contains the description of a binding so that you can add it to the binding table via a call to one of the methods.

A binding can refer to an input or an output tensor resource, or to a persistent or a temporary resource, and there are methods on to bind each kind. The type of the structure pointed to by Desc depends on the value of Type.

member.name: DML_BINDING_DESC.Type
member.summary: A specifying the type of the binding; whether it refers to a single buffer, or to an array of buffers.
